A B C D E G I L M N P R S T U

A

Application - Class in controllers
This app is designed to be stand alone or accessed from other websites.
It uses the BrainTree payment service via the JAVA API
Currently supports Entering credit card info and purchasing subscriptions.
Application() - Constructor for class controllers.Application
 
autoRenew - Variable in class models.Purchase
 

B

Bootstrap - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Bootstrap() - Constructor for class Bootstrap
 
buy(Long) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
User selected a subscription to buy.
Display Subscriptions buy.html, where user enters info to complete purchase.

C

cancelPurchase(Long) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
 
confirmPurchase(Long, Purchase) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
Completes purchase if data is valid.
Displays Subscriptions comfirmPurchase.html
controllers - package controllers
 
creditCard - Variable in class models.Purchase
 
creditCardExpiryMonth - Variable in class models.Purchase
 
creditCardExpiryYear - Variable in class models.Purchase
 
creditCardName - Variable in class models.Purchase
 

D

descr - Variable in class models.Subscription
 
doJob() - Method in class Bootstrap

E

expireDate - Variable in class models.Purchase
 

G

getDescription() - Method in class models.Purchase

getTotal() - Method in class models.Purchase
 

I

index() - Static method in class controllers.Application
If a user is logged in then display the Subscriptions main page (Subscriptions index.html),
otherwise display the application login page (Application index.html)
index() - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
Executes when index.html page loads and displays any purchased subscriptions the user has

L

list(String, Integer, Integer) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
Displays the available subscriptions based on search criteria.
login(String, String) - Static method in class controllers.Application
Find the first registered user that matches the login attempt.
If successful, save user name in session hashmap & display the Subscriptions main page (Subscriptions index.html),
otherwise display the application login page (Application index.html).
logout() - Static method in class controllers.Application
Delete the session and go to login page (Application index.html)

R

register() - Static method in class controllers.Application
Display the register user page (Application register.html)

S

saveSettings(String, String) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
 
saveUser(User, String) - Static method in class controllers.Application
If the entered password matches the registered user then display the Subscriptions main page (Subscriptions index.html),
otherwise display the register user page (Application register.html).
settings() - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
 
show(Long) - Static method in class controllers.Subscriptions
Displays one subscription (line item from search list)
Subscriptions show.html
subscription - Variable in class models.Purchase
 
Subscription - Class in models
 
Subscription() - Constructor for class models.Subscription
 
Subscriptions - Class in controllers
Validates that user is logged in.
Displays the user's purchases.
Allows searching subscriptions and purchasing one.
Subscriptions() - Constructor for class controllers.Subscriptions
